text: The Holy Mountain () is a 1973 Mexican fantasy drama movie directed by Alejandro Jodorowsky (who also stars and produces). It also stars Juan Ferrara, Horacio Salinas, and Ramona Saunders. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 fantasy movies Category:1973 drama movies Category:1973 LGBT movies Category:Mexican fantasy movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:Mexican LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Alejandro Jodorowsky
title: The Holy Mountain
